GSD.description:
hamradio: defer ax25 kfree after unregister_netdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.12 by commit cb6c99aedd2c843056a598a8907a6128cb07603b. For more details please see the references link.
